subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Voice Recognition Technology Video
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Does this really work? It's hard to believe that a speech can be synthesized by only using the nerve signals which control the vocal cords...

----- original Nachricht --------

Betreff: [EVP-ITC] Voice Recognition Technology Video
Gesendet: Mo, 17. Mr 2008
Von: LC Duplatt<lcdupla@...>

> ...a neckband that intercepts nerve signals allows you to talk on the 
> phone without emitting a sound from your voice. (Gabreael of Eastern 
> Paranormal found this)
